name: A-Capenna Express
oracle_text:
Sacrifice a Treasure: Capenna Express becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.
Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

name: A-Paragon of Modernity
oracle_text:
Flying
{3}: Paragon of Modernity gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If exactly three colors of mana were spent to activate this ability, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.

name: A-Ominous Parcel
oracle_text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Ominous Parcel: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Ominous Parcel: It deals 4 damage to target creature.

name: A-Glittermonger
oracle_text: {T}: Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

name: A-Masked Bandits
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{1}, Exile Masked Bandits from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}" until Masked Bandits is cast from exile. You may cast Masked Bandits for as long as it remains exiled.

name: A-Glamorous Outlaw
oracle_text:
When Glamorous Outlaw enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life. Scry 2.
{1}, Exile Glamorous Outlaw from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}" until Glamorous Outlaw is cast from exile. You may cast Glamorous Outlaw for as long as it remains exiled.

name: A-Rakish Revelers
oracle_text:
When Rakish Revelers enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.
{1}, Exile Rakish Revelers from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}" until Rakish Revelers is cast from exile. You may cast Rakish Revelers for as long as it remains exiled.

name: A-Shattered Seraph
oracle_text:
Flying
When Shattered Seraph enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
{1}, Exile Shattered Seraph from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}" until Shattered Seraph is cast from exile. You may cast Shattered Seraph for as long as it remains exiled.

name: A-Stimulus Package
oracle_text:
When Stimulus Package enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
Sacrifice a Treasure: Create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token. Scry 1.

name: A-Spara's Adjudicators
oracle_text:
When Spara's Adjudicators enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls can't attack or block until your next turn.
{1}, Exile Spara's Adjudicators from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}" until Spara's Adjudicators is cast from exile. You may cast Spara's Adjudicators for as long as it remains exiled.

name: A-Riveteers Initiate
oracle_text: {B/G}: Riveteers Initiate gains deathtouch until end of turn.

name: A-Cabaretti Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Cabaretti Charm deals damage equal to twice the number of creatures you control to target creature or planeswalker.
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
• Create two 1/1 green and white Citizen creature tokens.

name: A-Syndicate Infiltrator
oracle_text:
Flying, ward {2}
As long as there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard, Syndicate Infiltrator gets +2/+2.

name: A-Security Rhox
oracle_text: You may pay {R}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Spend only mana produced by Treasures to cast it this way.

name: A-Mr. Orfeo, the Boulder
oracle_text: Whenever you attack, double target creature's power until end of turn.

name: A-Forge Boss
oracle_text: Whenever you sacrifice one or more other creatures, Forge Boss deals 2 damage to each opponent. This ability triggers only once each turn.

name: A-Queza, Augur of Agonies
oracle_text: Whenever you draw a card, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

name: A-Civil Servant
oracle_text: Whenever Civil Servant attacks, you may tap another untapped Citizen you control. If you do, Civil Servant gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

name: A-Celestial Regulator
oracle_text:
Flying
When Celestial Regulator enters the battlefield, choose target creature you don't control and tap it. If you control a creature with a counter on it, the chosen creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: A-Metropolis Angel
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you attack with one or more creatures with counters on them, draw a card.

name: Oracle of the Alpha
oracle_text:
Flying
When Oracle of the Alpha enters the battlefield, conjure the Power Nine into your library, then shuffle.
Whenever Oracle of the Alpha attacks, scry 1.

name: Benalish Knight-Counselor
oracle_text:
Enlist
Whenever Benalish Knight-Counselor enlists a creature, you get a boon with "When you cast your next creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it."

name: Priest of Possibility
oracle_text: When Priest of Possibility enters the battlefield, look at the top seven cards of your library. If a card among them has flying, Priest of Possibility perpetually gains flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, protection, reach, trample, and vigilance. Then shuffle.

name: Pull of the Mist Moon
Skywriter Djinn
oracle_text:
Flying
Domain — When Skywriter Djinn enters the battlefield, conjure a random card from Skywriter Djinn's spellbook into your hand. Then if you have fewer cards in hand than the number of basic land types among lands you control, repeat this process.

name: Vesuvan Mist
oracle_text:
Kicker {1}{B}
Return target nontoken, nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, conjure a duplicate of that card into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."

name: Trove Mage
oracle_text: When Trove Mage enters the battlefield, seek an artifact card from among the top ten cards of your library, then shuffle.

name: Darigaaz's Whelp
oracle_text:
Kicker {1}{R}
Flying
Whenever you draw a Dragon card, it perpetually gets +1/+1.
When Darigaaz's Whelp enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, seek a Dragon card. Darigaaz's Whelp and that Dragon card each perpetually get +1/+1.

name: Diminished Returner
oracle_text:
Diminished Returner enters the battlefield tapped.
{B}{B}: Diminished Returner perpetually gets -1/-1, then return it to the battlefield. Activate only if Diminished Returner is in your graveyard and its toughness is 2 or greater.

name: Reezug, the Bonecobbler
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature card in your graveyard perpetually becomes an artifact. You may cast that card this turn. (It loses all other card types.)

name: Smogbelcher Chariot
oracle_text:
Menace, deathtouch, lifelink
Whenever Smogbelcher Chariot attacks, target creature that crewed it this turn perpetually gains your choice of menace, deathtouch, or lifelink.
Crew 3

name: Ghitu Embercoiler
oracle_text:
Prowess
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, you may discard a card. If you do, seek a card with greater mana value and exile it. Until the end of your next turn, you may platy the exiled card.

name: Goblin Influx Array
oracle_text:
Goblin spells you cast cost {R} less to cast. (If it doesn't require {R}, it costs {1} less to cast.)
At the beginning of your end step, conjure a random card from Goblin Influx Array's spellbook into your hand.

name: Goblin Morale Sergeant
oracle_text:
Haste
Enlist
Whenever enlists a nontoken creature, you may conjure a duplicate of that creature into the top five cards of your library at random. The duplicate perpetually gets +1/+0 and gains haste.

name: Spellchain Scatter
oracle_text:
Kicker {U}
When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, conjure a duplicate of that spell into your hand. If this spell wasn't kicked, discard the duplicate at the beginning of your next end step.

name: Marwyn's Kindred
oracle_text: Conjure a card named Marwyn, the Nurturer and X cards named Llanowar Elves onto the battlefield.

name: Nantuko Slicer
oracle_text:
Kicker {B}
When Nantuko Slicer enters the battlefield, return target card from your graveyard to your hand. If this spell was kicked, conjure a duplicate of target card in an opponent's graveyard into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."

name: Vinesoul Spider
oracle_text:
Reach
At the beginning of your end step, put a random land card from your library into your graveyard.

name: Wandering Treefolk
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Domain — {7}{G}: See a creature card. This ability costs 1 less to activate for each basic land among lands you control.

name: Arvad, Weatherlight Smuggler
oracle_text:
Deathtouch, lifelink
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, Arvad, Weatherlight Smuggler perpetually gets +X/+X where X is the number of creatures that died this turn. This ability also triggers is Arvad is in your graveyard.

name: Bloodsprout Talisman
oracle_text:
Bloodsprout Talisman enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}, Pay 1 life: Choose a nonland card in your hand. It perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} less to cast."

name: Darigaaz, Shivan Champion
oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of your end step, conjure a random card from Darigaaz, Shivan Champion's spellbook into exile face down with three egg counters on it. It gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, if this card is exiled, remove an egg counter from it. Then if it has no egg counters on it, put it onto the battlefield."

name: Juggernaut Peddler
oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Juggernaut Peddler enters the battlefield, target player reveals all nonland cards in their hand. You may choose one of those cards. If you do, that player exdiles it and conjures a card named Juggernaut into their hand.

name: Niambi, Beloved Protector
oracle_text:
Flash
When Niambi, Beloved Protector enters the battlefield, choose target nonlegendary creature card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Return it to the battlefield. It perpetually gains "Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn."

name: Protean War Engine
oracle_text:
As Protean War Engine enters the battlefield, draft a card from Protean War Engine's spellbook and exile it. Whenever Protean War Engine becomes crewed, until end of turn, it becomes a copy of the exiled card, except it's a Vehicle artifact in addition to its other types.
Crew 3

name: Slimefoot, Thallid Transplant
oracle_text: Whenever a Swamp or Forest enters the battlefield under your control, draft a card from Slimefoot, Thallid Transplant's spellbook.

name: Teferi's Contingency
oracle_text: Counter target spell. Each creature card in its controller's graveyard, hand, and library with the same name as that spell perpetually gains "This spell costs {2} more to cast."

name: Tiana, Angelic Mechanic
oracle_text:
Flying
When Tiana, Angelic Mechanic or another legendary creature you control crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle perpetually gets +1/+0.

name: Vodalian Tide Mage
oracle_text: Whenever one or more nontoken creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, choose one of those creatures. Conjure a duplicate of the chosen creature into your hand.

name: Coalition Construct
oracle_text:
As enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Coalition Construct is the chosen type in addition to its other types.
When enters the battlefield, other creatures you control of the chosen type and creature cards of that type in your hand perpetually get +1/+1.
